executable.cmd: ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks request_loop -s TopCenterLeft -f TopRight -r tinyRobot -n 5
ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks delayed_request_loop -s BottomCenterLeft -f BottomRight -r tinyRobot -n 5 --delay 2
ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks delayed_request_loop -s TopCenterRight -f TopLeft -r tinyRobot -n 5 --delay 4
ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks delayed_request_loop -s BottomCenterRight -f BottomLeft -r tinyRobot -n 5 --delay 6
